name: TextToVoice
0:
”Alexa, open TTV”
”Alexa, ask TTV for my pin”
”Alexa, ask TTV to speak”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. t. v.
des:
Text To Voice allows your Alexa enabled device to say anything you want.

Whatever you type, Alexa will speak.

This is an invaluable tool for Alexa skill developers and enthusiasts alike. It's the voice simulator on steroids and will let you test any SSML and plain text input through your Echo or other Alexa anabled device.

/* INSTRUCTIONS */

STEP 1 - Visit https://texttovoice.io

STEP 2 - Pair your device by asking Text To Voice for your voice pin. Say "Alexa, ask TTV for my pin"

STEP 3 - Enter text or SSML into the text area and hit 'save'

STEP 4 - Say "Alexa, ask TTV to speak"

We hope you enjoy this tool and it would mean the world to us if you left a 5* review if you find it useful. 

Thank you so much!

@topvoiceapps
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
